alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Dawson; Forsyth; Hall; Lumpkin; Pickens; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:12PM EDT until July 20 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cherokee County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Forsyth County in north central Georgia... Lumpkin County in north central Georgia... Southern White County in northeastern Georgia... Dawson County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Hall County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Pickens County in north central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 512 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jones Creek to Hinton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Cleveland, Dawsonville, Ball Ground, Nelson, Dougherty, Mossy Creek, Hightower, Juno, Fausett Lake, Matt, Murrayville, Tate, Leaf, Turners Corner, Qualatchee Lake, McKee, Camp Merrill and Marblehill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Dawson; Forsyth; Hall; Lumpkin; Pickens; White
